SEARCH
Package io.goobi.viewer.controller.config.filter

Class AbstractFilterConfiguration

java.lang.Object
io.goobi.viewer.controller.config.filter.AbstractFilterConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFilterConfiguration
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConfiguredValueFilter, PassedValueFilter
public abstract class AbstractFilterConfiguration extends Object implements IFilterConfiguration
A configurable filter allowing passage to document entities (record, docStruct, page) which satisfy certain conditions. The filter itself may contain condition filters which determine if the filter should be applied to an entity

  • Field Details

    • action

      protected final FilterAction action
      Whether the filter should block or pass entities meeting its condition.

    • filterConditions

      protected final List<AbstractFilterConfiguration> filterConditions
      Additional filters which must be passed in order for this filter to apply. If any filter conditions don't pass, this #applies(VariableReplacer) will always return false

      Create a new filter from a configuration block.
      Parameters:
      config - an xml configuration
      Throws:
      org.apache.commons.configuration2.ex.ConfigurationException - if the config is invalid

    • applies

      public boolean applies(VariableReplacer vr)
      Test whether all conditions of this filter apply, if any.
      Parameters:
      vr - a variable replacer representing the object to test
      Returns:
      true if the filterConditions all pass. If they don't the filter should not be applied

    • addCondition

      public void addCondition(AbstractFilterConfiguration condition)
      Add a conditional filter. The main filter is only applied if all conditional filters pass
      Parameters:
      condition -
